p: For determining the content of mineral ion the sample was prepared using wet digestion method described by Pequerul et al. (1993) with different concentration. The digestion was done with HNO 3 (supra-pure 60–70%). The resulting sample was analyzed for various metals (Ca, Zn, Fe, K, Na, Mg and Cu) in an inductively coupled plasma-optical emission spectrophotometer (ICP-OES, Optima 8000, Perkin Elmer, USA).
